remarks: The neighborhoods of a point ` P ` for the topology induced by an uniform space ` U ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Jan-2018.)
statement:
utoptop.1 $e |- J = ( unifTop ` U ) $.
utopsnneip.1 $e |- K = { a e. ~P X | A. p e. a a e. ( N ` p ) } $.
utopsnneip.2 $e |- N = ( p e. X |-> ran ( v e. U |-> ( v " { p } ) ) ) $.
utopsnneiplem $p |- ( ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) /\ P e. X ) -> ( ( nei ` J ) ` { P } ) = ran ( v e. U |-> ( v " { P } ) ) ) $.
$d K a p $.
$d N a p $.
$d P p v $.
$d U a p v $.
$d X a p v $.
